sig_info: Dormammu uses his opponent's powers as a link to reach deep within their soul. Each time a buff expires on his opponent Dormammu has up to a 100% chance to Degenerate them for 40 to 104.01 direct damage, over 10 seconds. The chance of this ability triggering increases the longer it's been since it was last triggered.

PASSIVE: As a being of pure mystical energy, Dormammu, is immune to all known poisons of the Battlerealm.
Dormammu, lacks blood and is therefore immune to Bleed effects.
DARK ENERGY: Dark Energy Charge is gained each time your opponent's Power level goes down, up to 100.
When the Charge reaches 100 it will be consumed by the next attack that has an Imbued effect triggering the Imbued effect in addition to any standard effects.
Gain 50 Dark Energy Charge for each Buff Nullified.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If there is no Soul Bond on the target, place one on it.
While a Soul Bond is active each Dark Energy Charge you gain also charges the Soul Bond, up to 100.
Detonate an active Soul Bond dealing up to 3.4 Direct Damage, per Soul Bond charge.
FINISH A COMBO WITH A MEDIUM ATTACK: The target doesn't gain Power from this Hit.
Depletes up to 7.5% of the target's max Power.
Imbued: Causes Power Burn instead, doing Direct Damage equal to 450% of the Power Drained from the opponent by this attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% Chance to Nullify 1 positive status effect from your opponent.
Imbued: Nullify all positive status effects from your opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Power Lock, severing the target's flow of Power for 9 seconds.
Imbued: Drain 20% of the target’s Max Power per hit.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Dimensional Link buff causing Dormammu to continually gain Dark Energy for 20 seconds.
Imbued: Gain an Empowered Dimensional Link buff. While it is active Dormammu will Regenerate 25% of Damage done by the Soul Bond detonation.

sig_info: Dormammu uses his opponent's powers as a link to reach deep within their soul. Each time a buff expires on his opponent Dormammu has up to a 100% chance to Degenerate them for 1572.74 to 3350.69 direct damage, over 10 seconds. The chance of this ability triggering increases the longer it's been since it was last triggered.

PASSIVE: As a being of pure mystical energy, Dormammu, is immune to all known poisons of the Battlerealm.
Dormammu, lacks blood and is therefore immune to Bleed effects.
DARK ENERGY: Dark Energy Charge is gained each time your opponent's Power level goes down, up to 100.
When the Charge reaches 100 it will be consumed by the next attack that has an Imbued effect triggering the Imbued effect in addition to any standard effects.
Gain 50 Dark Energy Charge for each Buff Nullified.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If there is no Soul Bond on the target, place one on it.
While a Soul Bond is active each Dark Energy Charge you gain also charges the Soul Bond, up to 100.
Detonate an active Soul Bond dealing up to 94.95 Direct Damage, per Soul Bond charge.
FINISH A COMBO WITH A MEDIUM ATTACK: The target doesn't gain Power from this Hit.
Depletes up to 7.5% of the target's max Power.
Imbued: Causes Power Burn instead, doing Direct Damage equal to 450% of the Power Drained from the opponent by this attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% Chance to Nullify 1 positive status effect from your opponent.
Imbued: Nullify all positive status effects from your opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Power Lock, severing the target's flow of Power for 9 seconds.
Imbued: Drain 20% of the target’s Max Power per hit.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Dimensional Link buff causing Dormammu to continually gain Dark Energy for 20 seconds.
Imbued: Gain an Empowered Dimensional Link buff. While it is active Dormammu will Regenerate 25% of Damage done by the Soul Bond detonation.
